item.description: Let me know if you decide to try it out and how it goes!
item.content:encoded: Let me know if you decide to try it out and how it goes!

item.title: By: saxmaam

item.description: Biphasic though ... I'm thinking on that one.
item.content:encoded: Biphasic though … I’m thinking on that one.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Fascinating. I'm not sure how well that would work out for me either. Maybe one day I'll just wake up and never need sleep again like that Thai guy he mentions. Haha. But for now, I think I'll stick with meditation and naps as needed!
item.content:encoded: Fascinating. I’m not sure how well that would work out for me either. Maybe one day I’ll just wake up and never need sleep again like that Thai guy he mentions. Haha. But for now, I think I’ll stick with meditation and naps as needed!

item.title: By: saxmaam
item.dc:creator: saxmaam
item.description: You might find Steve Pavlina's experiment with poly-phasic sleep to be interesting (google it ...). I don't think it worked out for him in the end.
item.content:encoded: You might find Steve Pavlina’s experiment with poly-phasic sleep to be interesting (google it …). I don’t think it worked out for him in the end.

item.title: By: Ben

item.content:encoded: Of course! It’s well deserved and I’m so glad to have you as part of the go blogging community!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hmm... I'll be honest in that I've never really tried naps. I'll have to add that to the list of things to try if I'm starting to crash. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hmm… I’ll be honest in that I’ve never really tried naps. I’ll have to add that to the list of things to try if I’m starting to crash. Thanks!

item.title: By: HeJin
item.dc:creator: HeJin
item.description: Hi! Thank you for the shout out!
item.content:encoded: Hi! Thank you for the shout out!

item.title: By: saxmaam
item.dc:creator: saxmaam
item.description: One thing I've learned is that naps work best if your life is caffeine-free. Otherwise you get in a bad cycle where you use caffeine to wake up from the nap or nightly sleep, and then it messes up your next attempt to sleep, and so on forever.
item.content:encoded: One thing I’ve learned is that naps work best if your life is caffeine-free. Otherwise you get in a bad cycle where you use caffeine to wake up from the nap or nightly sleep, and then it messes up your next attempt to sleep, and so on forever.

item.description: One thing I've learned is that naps work best if your life is caffeine-free. Otherwise you get in a bad cycle where you use caffeine to wake up from the nap or nightly sleep, and then it messes up your next attempt to sleep, and so on forever.
item.content:encoded: One thing I’ve learned is that naps work best if your life is caffeine-free. Otherwise you get in a bad cycle where you use caffeine to wake up from the nap or nightly sleep, and then it messes up your next attempt to sleep, and so on forever.
